DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Assessing Outcomes , Adverse Events , Treatment Patterns , Quality Life Patients Diagnosed With Mycosis Fungoides Cutaneous T-cell Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , prospective , observational , US-based drug study . All consecutive MF-CTCL patient treat Valchlor invite enroll study.Patients undergo clinical assessment receive standard medical care , determine patient ' physician , real world set . With exception protocol-required patient complete questionnaire symptom QOL , specific mandate clinical assessment perform . Patients follow prospectively maximum 1 year
